name: Crane Style

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +2 or monk level 1st.

sections.text: You take only a –2 penalty on attack rolls for fighting defensively. While using this style and fighting defensively or using the total defense action, you gain an additional +1 dodge bonus to your Armor Class.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your unarmed fighting techniques blend poise with graceful defense.
